titles.title: Let the Lower Lights Be Burning

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Brightly beams our Fatherâ€™s mercy From His lighthouse evermore, But to us He gives the keeping Of the lights along the shore.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Let the lower lights be burning! Send a gleam across the wave! Some poor fainting, struggling seaman You may rescue, you may save.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Dark the night of sin has settled, Loud the angry billows roar; Eager eyes are watching, longing, For the lights along the shore.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Trim your feeble lamp, my brother; Some poor sailor, tempest-tossed, Trying now to make the harbor, In the darkness may be lost.
